author: Peter Yeung
title: The Rolling Stones announce definitive London exhibition
text: The Rolling Stones announce definitive London exhibition The major retrospective at Kensington’s Saatchi Gallery will trace the band’s glittering career Mick Jagger: The Rolling Stones's boisterous frontman Photo: FACUNDO ARRIZABALAG By Peter Yeung
